I was inspired by the WW2 Propaganda posters, I thought I'd splice one together from the 'Bad Piggies' loadscreen and an excellent artist whose name escapes me
Brilliant! I was planning on doing something like that myself

Well I do this kinda crap for a living, but if you have a good idea (or a good cause) I'll draw something for you!

(The things I do for the KSP community, jeez
